tool_description: The easiest API to get Office quotes and tidbits on the web
title: thatsWhatTheySaid

api_list.name: Quotes
api_list.description: A Quotes Request returns  a random quote by the specified character

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This parameter takes the first name of a character in the show and returns a random quote of the character

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thatswhattheysaid.p.rapidapi.com/theOfficequotes/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thatswhattheysaid.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trivia
api_list.description: A Trivia Request returns a random trivia about the show

api_list.name: Characters
api_list.description: A Characters Request returns the characters from the show
